title:
EDHOC is a New Security Handshake Standard: An Overview of Security
  Analysis
authors:
Elsa L\'opez P\'erez, Inria G\"oran Selander, John Preu{\ss} Mattsson,
  Thomas Watteyne, Mali\v{s}a Vu\v{c}ini\'c
abstract:
The paper wraps up the call for formal analysis of the new security handshake
protocol EDHOC by providing an overview of the protocol as it was standardized,
a summary of the formal security analyses conducted by the community, and a
discussion on open venues for future work.
